message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's better to secure something now than risk losing out to inflation.
I think a more fair split is 60/40. We both get a good share, and it avoids the risk of inflation hurting your side too much.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is eating away at my share with each round. I'm willing to go a bit lower than my initial offer, but 55/45 is my bottom line this round.
